orbiter.name: Color Wheels.Master Color Wheel
orbiter.info:
Adjusts the Master Color Wheel.

Turn = Master Brightness
Tilt X = Master Wheel Horizontal
Tilt Y = Master Wheel Vertical

orbiter.name: Color Wheels.Shadows Color Wheel
orbiter.info:
Adjusts the Shadows Color Wheel.

Turn = Shadows Brightness
Tilt X = Shadows Wheel Horizontal
Tilt Y = Shadows Wheel Vertical

Tilt X = Midtones Wheel Horizontal
Tilt Y = Midtones Wheel Vertical

orbiter.name: Color Wheels.Highlights Color Wheel
orbiter.info:
